name: A Mini Falafel Adventure
description:
Hello!

A Mini Falafel Adventure is a condensed, action-oriented Metroidvania with an emphasis on memorable boss fights, characters and gameplay-twisting power-ups. It was developed over 3 years and features a chiptune/disco soundtrack by Reed Richards.

This is the full version of A Mini Falafel Adventure, originally created for a Retro Remakes competition in March 2007. This version is much longer and contains many more bosses and power-ups. An average playthrough will take about 2 hours, so it's not a long game, but the goal of A Mini Falafel Adventure is to take you on a journey and surprise you. Have a good time!


Trailer


Soundtrack

The soundtrack by Reed also available here, in .mp3 format: https://app.box.com/s/3c4nk5bkwdyw22smzhorgyprcu0eoe37

Cover Art by Ben Hickling
